price: 16 Le jour où Nous les saisirons violemment, Nous tirerons vengeance d’eux.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
